tickets.description: NFL International Series - Minnesota Vikings vs Pittsburgh Steelers

injuries.longComment: Though Warren's name was also on Wednesday's practice report, his listed limitations then only cited 'NIR -resting vet.' While the addition of 'knee' to Thursday's report is worth noting, so far there's nothing to suggest that the running back's status for Sunday's game against the Vikings in Dublin is in any danger. Friday's final injury report will reveal whether Warren heads into the weekend with an injury designation or cleared to face Minnesota.
injuries.shortComment: Warren (NIR - resting vet/knee) was listed as a limited participant at practice Thursday, Teresa Varley of the Steelers' official site reports.

items.headline: Warren (NIR - resting vet/knee) was listed as a limited participant at practice Thursday, Teresa Varley of the Steelers' official site reports.
items.text: Though Warren's name was also on Wednesday's practice report, his listed limitations then only cited 'NIR -resting vet.' While the addition of 'knee' to Thursday's report is worth noting, so far there's nothing to suggest that the running back's status for Sunday's game against the Vikings in Dublin is in any danger. Friday's final injury report will reveal whether Warren heads into the weekend with an injury designation or cleared to face Minnesota.

injuries.longComment: The hip issue is new for Smith after he was listed as a DNP due to rest only Wednesday. However, the limited practice would suggest Smith has a chance to play Sunday morning against the Vikings unless he was injured in Thursday's session. If Smith were unable to go, Pat Freiermuth and Darnell Washington would handle tight-end duties for the Steelers.
injuries.shortComment: Smith (hip/rest) was limited in Thursday's practice.

items.headline: Smith (hip/rest) was limited in Thursday's practice.
items.text: The hip issue is new for Smith after he was listed as a DNP due to rest only Wednesday. However, the limited practice would suggest Smith has a chance to play Sunday morning against the Vikings unless he was injured in Thursday's session. If Smith were unable to go, Pat Freiermuth and Darnell Washington would handle tight-end duties for the Steelers.

injuries.longComment: Porter hasn't played since he injured his hamstring in Week 1 against the Jets. He hadn't even practiced since that contest, so his return to the field as a limited participant Wednesday suggests that he's making progress in his recovery. According to DeFabo, Steelers coach Mike Tomlin said Tuesday that Porter has a chance to suit up against the Vikings on Sunday.
injuries.shortComment: Porter (hamstring) practiced in a limited fashion Wednesday, Mike DeFabo of The Athletic reports.

items.headline: Porter (hamstring) practiced in a limited fashion Wednesday, Mike DeFabo of The Athletic reports.
items.text: Porter hasn't played since he injured his hamstring in Week 1 against the Jets. He hadn't even practiced since that contest, so his return to the field as a limited participant Wednesday suggests that he's making progress in his recovery. According to DeFabo, Steelers coach Mike Tomlin said Tuesday that Porter has a chance to suit up against the Vikings on Sunday.

injuries.longComment: Highsmith will have to sit out at least one more game as he continues to recover from the high ankle sprain he sustained in Week 2 versus the Seahawks. His next opportunity to suit up will come in Week 6 versus the Browns. In the meantime, 2023 fourth-rounder Nick Herbig projects to start on the edge opposite T.J. Watt.
injuries.shortComment: Coach Mike Tomlin said Wednesday that Highsmith (ankle) won't play in Sunday's game versus Minnesota, Teresa Varley of the Steelers' official site reports.

items.headline: Coach Mike Tomlin said Wednesday that Highsmith (ankle) won't play in Sunday's game versus Minnesota, Teresa Varley of the Steelers' official site reports.
items.text: Highsmith will have to sit out at least one more game as he continues to recover from the high ankle sprain he sustained in Week 2 versus the Seahawks. His next opportunity to suit up will come in Week 6 versus the Browns. In the meantime, 2023 fourth-rounder Nick Herbig projects to start on the edge opposite T.J. Watt.

injuries.longComment: Elliott hurt his knee in the season opener against the Jets and missed each of Pittsburgh's subsequent two games. He didn't practice at all for two weeks prior to Wednesday, so his return to the field, even as a limited participant, is a promising sign. According to DeFabo, Pittsburgh coach Mike Tomlin said Tuesday that Elliott has a chance to return for Sunday's game against Minnesota.
injuries.shortComment: Elliott (knee) was a limited participant in Wednesday's practice, Mike DeFabo of The Athletic reports.

items.headline: Elliott (knee) was a limited participant in Wednesday's practice, Mike DeFabo of The Athletic reports.
items.text: Elliott hurt his knee in the season opener against the Jets and missed each of Pittsburgh's subsequent two games. He didn't practice at all for two weeks prior to Wednesday, so his return to the field, even as a limited participant, is a promising sign. According to DeFabo, Pittsburgh coach Mike Tomlin said Tuesday that Elliott has a chance to return for Sunday's game against Minnesota.

injuries.longComment: Slay suffered a leg contusion in the team's 21-14 win over the Patriots in Week 3, but Wednesday's absence was simply a rest day for the veteran. Head coach Mike Tomlin said Wednesday that the cornerback is expected to play Sunday in Dublin against the Vikings.
injuries.shortComment: Slay did not participate at practice Wednesday, Teresa Varley of the Steelers' official website reports.

items.headline: Slay did not participate at practice Wednesday, Teresa Varley of the Steelers' official website reports.
items.text: Slay suffered a leg contusion in the team's 21-14 win over the Patriots in Week 3, but Wednesday's absence was simply a rest day for the veteran. Head coach Mike Tomlin said Wednesday that the cornerback is expected to play Sunday in Dublin against the Vikings.

injuries.longComment: Jabrill Peppers saw his first defensive snaps of the season in Week 3, and they mostly came at the expense of Thornhill, who only played 26 of the Steelers' 71 defensive snaps. Things will only get complicated further when DeShon Elliott (knee) comes back into the fold, so Thornhill's role in Pittsburgh's defensive backfield looks like it might be on shaky ground as the season develops.
injuries.shortComment: Thornhill recorded six tackles (three solo) during Sunday's 21-14 win at New England.

items.headline: Thornhill recorded six tackles (three solo) during Sunday's 21-14 win at New England.
items.text: Jabrill Peppers saw his first defensive snaps of the season in Week 3, and they mostly came at the expense of Thornhill, who only played 26 of the Steelers' 71 defensive snaps. Things will only get complicated further when DeShon Elliott (knee) comes back into the fold, so Thornhill's role in Pittsburgh's defensive backfield looks like it might be on shaky ground as the season develops.

injuries.longComment: Clark led the Steelers' safeties in snaps Sunday with 53, and he came up with six-plus tackles for the third straight contest. He seems to be locked into a big role as long as DeShon Elliott (knee) remains out, so his status will be worth keeping track of for those in need of an IDP option for Week 4.
injuries.shortComment: Clark recorded six tackles (three solo) during Sunday's 21-14 win at New England.

items.headline: Clark recorded six tackles (three solo) during Sunday's 21-14 win at New England.
items.text: Clark led the Steelers' safeties in snaps Sunday with 53, and he came up with six-plus tackles for the third straight contest. He seems to be locked into a big role as long as DeShon Elliott (knee) remains out, so his status will be worth keeping track of for those in need of an IDP option for Week 4.

injuries.longComment: Wilson recovered a critical fumble near the goal line early in the third quarter to help preserve what was a 14-7 lead. He also logged seven-plus tackles for the second consecutive game in Week 3. He's played his way into IDP consideration heading into a Week 4 tilt versus the Vikings.
injuries.shortComment: Wilson recorded seven tackles (five solo) and a fumble recovery during Sunday's 21-14 win at New England.

items.headline: Wilson recorded seven tackles (five solo) and a fumble recovery during Sunday's 21-14 win at New England.
items.text: Wilson recovered a critical fumble near the goal line early in the third quarter to help preserve what was a 14-7 lead. He also logged seven-plus tackles for the second consecutive game in Week 3. He's played his way into IDP consideration heading into a Week 4 tilt versus the Vikings.

injuries.longComment: Watt's pair of sacks ended Watt's five-game regular-season sack drought, dating back to last season. Through three games in 2025, Watt has 14 tackles (seven solo), including the 2.0 sacks and one pass breakup in addition to the forced fumble and fumble recovery. Watt will look to build on the Week 3 performance Sunday against the Vikings in Dublin.
injuries.shortComment: Watt recorded five tackles (two solo), including 2.0 sacks, along with a forced fumble and a fumble recovery in the Steelers' win over the Patriots on Sunday.

items.headline: Watt recorded five tackles (two solo), including 2.0 sacks, along with a forced fumble and a fumble recovery in the Steelers' win over the Patriots on Sunday.
items.text: Watt's pair of sacks ended Watt's five-game regular-season sack drought, dating back to last season. Through three games in 2025, Watt has 14 tackles (seven solo), including the 2.0 sacks and one pass breakup in addition to the forced fumble and fumble recovery. Watt will look to build on the Week 3 performance Sunday against the Vikings in Dublin.

injuries.longComment: With Joey Porter (hamstring) missing another contest, Echols got the start in Pittsburgh's secondary and played 84 percent of the defensive snaps. Echols' interception came at the end of the first half, picking off Drake Maye in the end zone on a pass intended for Kayshon Boutte. It was Echols' first interception of the season.
injuries.shortComment: Echols recorded six tackles (four solo) and one interception in the Steelers' win over the Patriots on Sunday.

items.headline: Echols recorded six tackles (four solo) and one interception in the Steelers' win over the Patriots on Sunday.
items.text: With Joey Porter (hamstring) missing another contest, Echols got the start in Pittsburgh's secondary and played 84 percent of the defensive snaps. Echols' interception came at the end of the first half, picking off Drake Maye in the end zone on a pass intended for Kayshon Boutte. It was Echols' first interception of the season.

injuries.longComment: Freiermuth recorded three receptions in each of the first two weeks of the regular season, but he was held in check during Sunday's victory. However, he played 70 percent of the team's offensive snaps, which lagged just behind Jonnu Smith, who was on the field for 83 percent. Over the first three games of the year, Freiermuth has secured seven of 10 targets for 65 yards, slightly behind Smith's 12-65-1 line on 13 targets.
injuries.shortComment: Freiermuth secured one of three targets for six yards during Sunday's 21-14 win over the Patriots.

items.headline: Freiermuth secured one of three targets for six yards during Sunday's 21-14 win over the Patriots.
items.text: Freiermuth recorded three receptions in each of the first two weeks of the regular season, but he was held in check during Sunday's victory. However, he played 70 percent of the team's offensive snaps, which lagged just behind Jonnu Smith, who was on the field for 83 percent. Over the first three games of the year, Freiermuth has secured seven of 10 targets for 65 yards, slightly behind Smith's 12-65-1 line on 13 targets.

injuries.longComment: Wilson was held without a target for the second time in the first three weeks of the regular season, and he was on the field for just 17 percent of the team's offensive snaps in Week 3. Although Wilson appears to be third on the Steelers' depth chart at wide receiver, he's unlikely to have a fantasy-relevant role as long as DK Metcalf and Calvin Austin stay healthy.
injuries.shortComment: Wilson wasn't targeted during Sunday's 21-14 win over the Patriots.

items.headline: Wilson wasn't targeted during Sunday's 21-14 win over the Patriots.
items.text: Wilson was held without a target for the second time in the first three weeks of the regular season, and he was on the field for just 17 percent of the team's offensive snaps in Week 3. Although Wilson appears to be third on the Steelers' depth chart at wide receiver, he's unlikely to have a fantasy-relevant role as long as DK Metcalf and Calvin Austin stay healthy.

injuries.longComment: Johnson saw minimal snaps over the first two weeks of the regular season, but he was held out Sunday following last week's error on special teams that led to a Seattle touchdown. Jaylen Warren continued to serve as the lead back against New England, playing 80 percent of the Steelers' offensive snaps, while Kenneth Gainwell was on the field for 26 percent. The Steelers invested a third-round pick in Johnson, but the rookie has some work to do if he hopes to carve out a fantasy-relevant role.
injuries.shortComment: Johnson didn't take the field during Sunday's 21-14 win over the Patriots.

items.headline: Johnson didn't take the field during Sunday's 21-14 win over the Patriots.
items.text: Johnson saw minimal snaps over the first two weeks of the regular season, but he was held out Sunday following last week's error on special teams that led to a Seattle touchdown. Jaylen Warren continued to serve as the lead back against New England, playing 80 percent of the Steelers' offensive snaps, while Kenneth Gainwell was on the field for 26 percent. The Steelers invested a third-round pick in Johnson, but the rookie has some work to do if he hopes to carve out a fantasy-relevant role.

injuries.longComment: The kicker did not attempt a field goal in the win. Boswell has yet to miss in 2025, going five of five on field goals and seven of seven on extra-point attempts. The longtime Steeler converted more than 90 percent of his field-goal tries in five of six seasons between 2019 and 2024.
injuries.shortComment: Boswell went three of three on extra points in Sunday's 21-14 win over the Patriots.

items.headline: Boswell went three of three on extra points in Sunday's 21-14 win over the Patriots.
items.text: The kicker did not attempt a field goal in the win. Boswell has yet to miss in 2025, going five of five on field goals and seven of seven on extra-point attempts. The longtime Steeler converted more than 90 percent of his field-goal tries in five of six seasons between 2019 and 2024.

injuries.longComment: The third-year wideout hauled in a 17-yard toss from Aaron Rodgers with a little over two minutes left in the fourth quarter to break a 14-14 tie. Austin has quickly earned the veteran QB's trust, and after scoring five TDs in 34 games through his first two NFL seasons, he already has two in the first three contests of 2025, part of an 8-126-2 line on 15 targets. Austin will look to stay productive in Week 4 against the Vikings.
injuries.shortComment: Austin caught three of five targets for 34 yards and a touchdown in Sunday's 21-14 win over the Patriots.

items.headline: Austin caught three of five targets for 34 yards and a touchdown in Sunday's 21-14 win over the Patriots.
items.text: The third-year wideout hauled in a 17-yard toss from Aaron Rodgers with a little over two minutes left in the fourth quarter to break a 14-14 tie. Austin has quickly earned the veteran QB's trust, and after scoring five TDs in 34 games through his first two NFL seasons, he already has two in the first three contests of 2025, part of an 8-126-2 line on 15 targets. Austin will look to stay productive in Week 4 against the Vikings.

injuries.longComment: The former Eagle scored his first TD as a Steeler in the first quarter, punching in a one-yard score for the game's first points. Gainwell has worked as a short-yardage complement to Jaylen Warren through three weeks, a role that has led him to 85 scrimmage yards on 23 touches, and he'll likely need to find the end zone again to have much fantasy value in Week 4 against the Vikings.
injuries.shortComment: Gainwell carried the ball four times for 16 yards and a touchdown and caught his only target for 10 yards in Sunday's 21-14 win over the Patriots.

items.headline: Gainwell carried the ball four times for 16 yards and a touchdown and caught his only target for 10 yards in Sunday's 21-14 win over the Patriots.
items.text: The former Eagle scored his first TD as a Steeler in the first quarter, punching in a one-yard score for the game's first points. Gainwell has worked as a short-yardage complement to Jaylen Warren through three weeks, a role that has led him to 85 scrimmage yards on 23 touches, and he'll likely need to find the end zone again to have much fantasy value in Week 4 against the Vikings.

injuries.longComment: The veteran wideout continues to build chemistry with new quarterback Aaron Rodgers, bringing down a 12-yard jump ball early in the second quarter -- a score that moved Rodgers past Brett Favre into fourth place on the NFL's career passing TD list. Metcalf has found the end zone in back-to-back games, but he isn't yet seeing the target volume as a Steeler that he was accustomed to in Seattle. He'll take a 10-135-2 line on 17 targets into a Week 4 clash with the Vikings.
injuries.shortComment: Metcalf caught three of four targets for 32 yards and a touchdown in Sunday's 21-14 win over the Patriots.

items.headline: Metcalf caught three of four targets for 32 yards and a touchdown in Sunday's 21-14 win over the Patriots.
items.text: The veteran wideout continues to build chemistry with new quarterback Aaron Rodgers, bringing down a 12-yard jump ball early in the second quarter -- a score that moved Rodgers past Brett Favre into fourth place on the NFL's career passing TD list. Metcalf has found the end zone in back-to-back games, but he isn't yet seeing the target volume as a Steeler that he was accustomed to in Seattle. He'll take a 10-135-2 line on 17 targets into a Week 4 clash with the Vikings.

injuries.longComment: The veteran QB hit DK Metcalf for a 12-yard score in the second quarter and Calvin Austin with a game-winning 17-yarder with just over two minutes left in the fourth. Rodgers' first touchdown of the afternoon also moved him past Brett Favre into fourth place on the NFL's all-time list, and he finished the game with 510 -- putting him 29 behind Peyton Manning for third place. Rodgers has a 7:3 TD:INT through his first three games as a Steeler, but he faces a tough test in Week 4 in Ireland against the Vikings.
injuries.shortComment: Rodgers completed 16 of 23 passes for 139 and two touchdowns with one interception in Sunday's 21-14 win over the Patriots. He added one rushing yard on four carries.

items.headline: Rodgers completed 16 of 23 passes for 139 and two touchdowns with one interception in Sunday's 21-14 win over the Patriots. He added one rushing yard on four carries.
items.text: The veteran QB hit DK Metcalf for a 12-yard score in the second quarter and Calvin Austin with a game-winning 17-yarder with just over two minutes left in the fourth. Rodgers' first touchdown of the afternoon also moved him past Brett Favre into fourth place on the NFL's all-time list, and he finished the game with 510 -- putting him 29 behind Peyton Manning for third place. Rodgers has a 7:3 TD:INT through his first three games as a Steeler, but he faces a tough test in Week 4 in Ireland against the Vikings.

injuries.longComment: After logging limited sessions Wednesday and Thursday, Harmon was upgraded to a full participant Friday and deemed questionable. The rookie first-round pick will shake off the injury designation and make his NFL debut in Week 3 after missing the first two games due to an MCL sprain he suffered in Pittsburgh's preseason finale. Defensive coordinator Teryl Austin said Harmon would be eased into the rotation, so expect limited snaps from the 6-foot-3, 313-pound defensive lineman.
injuries.shortComment: Harmon (knee) is active for Sunday's game against the Patriots.

items.headline: Harmon (knee) is active for Sunday's game against the Patriots.
items.text: After logging limited sessions Wednesday and Thursday, Harmon was upgraded to a full participant Friday and deemed questionable. The rookie first-round pick will shake off the injury designation and make his NFL debut in Week 3 after missing the first two games due to an MCL sprain he suffered in Pittsburgh's preseason finale. Defensive coordinator Teryl Austin said Harmon would be eased into the rotation, so expect limited snaps from the 6-foot-3, 313-pound defensive lineman.

injuries.longComment: Scharping's season is over after he suffered a torn ACL during practice Wednesday. With Scharping sidelined, Spencer Anderson is currently the only backup guard on Pittsburgh's active roster.
injuries.shortComment: The Steelers placed Scharping (knee) on injured reserve Saturday, Teresa Varley of the team's official site reports.

items.headline: The Steelers placed Scharping (knee) on injured reserve Saturday, Teresa Varley of the team's official site reports.
items.text: Scharping's season is over after he suffered a torn ACL during practice Wednesday. With Scharping sidelined, Spencer Anderson is currently the only backup guard on Pittsburgh's active roster.

injuries.longComment: The 2022 third-round pick from Texas A&M has appeared in 28 regular-season games for the Steelers over his NFL career, recording 33 total tackles, including 1.0 sacks, and four passes defended. Now back with the team's active roster, Leal is expected to play a depth role on Pittsburgh's defensive line.
injuries.shortComment: The Steelers signed Leal from their practice squad Wednesday, Teresa Varley of the team's official site reports.

items.headline: The Steelers signed Leal from their practice squad Wednesday, Teresa Varley of the team's official site reports.
items.text: The 2022 third-round pick from Texas A&M has appeared in 28 regular-season games for the Steelers over his NFL career, recording 33 total tackles, including 1.0 sacks, and four passes defended. Now back with the team's active roster, Leal is expected to play a depth role on Pittsburgh's defensive line.
